```{r}
install.packages("tm", "wordcloud", "Snowball")
library(tm)
library(wordcloud)
library(SnowballC)
```


```{r}
quiz <- Corpus(DirSource("quiz"))

inspect(quiz)

quiz <- tm_map(quiz, stripWhitespace)

quiz <- tm_map(quiz, tolower)

quiz <- tm_map(quiz, removeWords, stopwords('english'))

quiz <- tm_map(quiz, stemDocument)

quiz <- tm_map(quiz, removeNumbers)

quiz <- tm_map(quiz, removePunctuation)

quiz <- tm_map(quiz, PlainTextDocument)

wordcloud(quiz, scale=c(5,0.5), max.words=100, random.order=FALSE, rot.per=0.35, use.r.layout=FALSE, colors=brewer.pal(8, 'Dark2'))

```
